metadata.title: CVE-2017-12453 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The _bfd_vms_slurp_eeom function in libbfd.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29 and earlier, allows remote attackers to cause an out of bounds heap read via a crafted vms alpha file.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.29.1-1ubuntu1').
